TopicTitle: Voyager Labs Aeronautics and Space Administration (ORDERS ON HOLD ATM)

Articles.Content: Yes, I haven't really gotten around to it until today, I'll fix it when I get a suitable pic

Hey Sbowyer,

I've got the Deep Space Horizon download here if you would like: http://www./?xj8pxy7pupyfd8r

You can add it to the rocket pack under the name Joopitur V, Deep Space Horizon is the mission name. Please keep in mind that the Joopitur V is all stock, but Deep Space Horizon, the payload, uses Probobodyne.

Thanks!

Plaatinum Aerospace

Plaatinum thanks I actually like the Light Weight concept alot actually.
hi Sbowyer i just finished the updateing of the probe kit and is ready for download so look on my signiture and give it a go it should still work withe the previous launchigs before
hello im hear to tell everyone that im developing a Plooto I Heavy a 2 stage heavy rocket for heavy payloads and/or a 3 manned orbiter

Plaatinum thanks I actually like the Light Weight concept alot actually.

I do too. I wanted to develop one of the lightest space craft to reach solar orbit. The result: Jooptiur V!

Thanks!

Heres a present, Merkury Atlas Heavy, Fulcan I And Fulcan V!!!

Merkury Atlas Heavy (Fictional)

Fulcan I (Falcon I KSP Replica Somewhat )

Fulcan V (Falcon V KSP Replica Somewhat )

Note: These spacecraft aren't meant to be manned and these are just for ideas on how to build them I will update the download tonight.
I know I said the Fulcan I & V But...
Isn't that unstable?
Probably!

No it is actually the most stable rocket I've built, Just need RCS to turn because the engines dont gimbal

EDIT: Assuming you are experienced you can get to an orbit, This thing is on a fuel budget definately because of its size.

EDIT AGAIN: Updated the Pack the Fulcan IX and and the Merkury's Have fun with the Fulcan IX It is actually very stable.

Edited October 8, 2012 by Sbowyer28

I love the new rockets!

EDIT: I'm working on the Leviathan space station...... I need a launch system to place it in Kerbin Orbit. My attempts killed my CPU and devoured my RAM. Hopefully I'm getting a new laptop soon!

Nothing is known except this picture:

P.S. Uses deep-space mission pack
Have you tried the Plooto V, Should be able to get it into an orbit around Kerbin atleast.
Wow. I realized that I am an employee and I haven't dowloaded the pack. I am a total N00B.
Im going to do alot of tests on my VL Server, Get ready for the missions list to fill up!!!
Well Kouston we have a problem... My KSP files were corrupted, I'm going to take this opportunity to restart the mission list though with Voyager I Being the only one still there.

Heres the newish logo I've been working on

Also after our successful missions we got a Budget Raise and we now have enough money for MMI for Satellites, Payload fairings, And MINING!!!!!

Behold.... The Leviathan II. This space station, launched aboard the Plooto V, is design to stay in space for as long as possible. It is also VL's first station!

Constructed using parts from the Deep Space Mission Pack and Probodobyne.

Download: http://www./?uk7b58c290tw81e

Pic:

Enjoy!
Well I will give you first since my Persistance file corrupted but I had a docking Space Station in orbit of kerbin until GRRRR CORRUPTION!!!!!

Ok, You can call it the second I don't care.

Other wise it's fine.

Also, I HATE CORRUPTION TOO!
No I'll give you first OFFICIAL but you should put it in a Persistance file by its self for Rendezvous practice for Voyager Labs Members
Ok, I'm putting up a persistence file tomorrow that has the Leviathan and Deep Space Horizon. If I forget, yell at me
